data.caption: Clarification sought from Gland Pharma Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Gland Pharma Ltd on August 1 2025 with reference to news appeared in https://www.moneycontrol.com dated August 1 2025 quoting "Pharma stocks slump as Trump shoots letters to 17 global drug majors seeking lower prices"

The reply is awaited.
